FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: + . **WONDER GADOT** (2015 f. by Medaglia d'Oro). 4 wins in 6 starts at 2 and 3, $1,118,140, in Canada, horse of the year in Canada (2018), champion 2-year-old filly in Canada (2017), champion 3-year-old filly in Canada (2018), 1st Mazarine S. **[G3]** (WO, $94,500), Queen's Plate S.-R (WO, $600,000), Prince of Wales S.-R (FE, $240,000), 2nd Woodbine Oaks-R (WO, $100,000), 3rd Natalma S. **[G1]** (WO, $30,000); winner at 2, $665,600, in N.A./U.S., 1st Demoiselle S. **[G2]** (AQU, $150,000), 2nd Longines Kentucky Oaks **[G1]** (CD, $182,000), Fantasy S. **[G3]** (OP, $80,000), Silverbulletday S. [L] (FG, $30,000), 3rd Cotillion S. **[G1]** (PRX, $111,200), Twinspires.com Fair Grounds Oaks **[G2]** (FG, $40,000), Rachel Alexandra S. **[G2]** (FG, $20,000). Sent from United States to Japan in 2020. (Total: $1,524,861). Dam of 1 foal-- 473 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 **WONDER GADOT** 2015 f Loving Vindication + . Bezzera (2013 f. by Medaglia d'Oro). Unraced. Dam of 4 foals, 2 to race, 1 winner-- 473 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 Bezzera 2013 r Loving Vindication + . . Patron d'Oro (2018 c. by Street Boss). Winner at 4, 2022, $52,800. 473 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 Patron d'Oro 2018 r + . **SECRET SPICE** (2015 f. by Discreet Cat). 3 wins, 2 to 4, $548,510, 1st Beholder Mile S. **[G1]** (SA, $240,000), 2nd La Troienne S. **[G1]** (CD, $96,000), Clement L. Hirsch S. **[G1]** (DMR, $60,000), Zenyatta S. **[G2]** (SA, $40,000), 3rd Desi Arnaz S. [L] (DMR, $12,000). Sent from United States to Japan in 2019. Dam of 1 foal-- 473 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 **SECRET SPICE** 2015 f Chimayo + . **Mexican Hat** (2014 f. by Street Cry (IRE)). 2 wins at 4, $110,610, in Canada, 3rd Belle Mahone S. (WO, $11,000); placed at 3, 8,100 Euro, in France. Sent from United States to Great Britain in 2015. Returned to United States from France in 2018. (Total: $94,496). Dam of 3 foals-- 473 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 **Mexican Hat** 2014 c Chimayo + . **Tan and Tight** (2016 f. by Uncle Mo). Winner at 4, $112,300, 2nd Camptown S.-R (CNL, $12,000).
